title: TEEMOS shroom
body: i think teemos omega skin needs his mushrooms to be bouncing Bettys or land mines pls riot consider this

replies.body: A friend and I are hoping that they're fatman mini-nukes :3

Riot, you guys should change his Q. It looks stupid. The knife he throws should at least spin, if its not going to spin then make it a ballistic knife.

Also, you guys made him into like some kinda Tom Clancy's Ghost/Splinter Cell thing. Make his passive be indicated by his cape, like a vfx in which the cape changes colors or pixelates as he stealths. Pls Rito, don't rush this awesome skin. I can wait.

Furthermore, give him more interactions!!!! For an 1820 skin he should have more! For example, Teemo's best friend is a bush, give him an interaction when he enters a bush like "They won't find me now." etc. Since he already has a Nashorn's Tooth interaction, give him an actual Baron interaction if he assist or slays Baron possibly Dragon too.
I'm sure that would be cool, or some spinning top glassy looking with a nuke symbol flashing on them, when blown up it mushroom clouds
